com.common.core

Class sTestScreenCaptureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.common.core.sTestScreenCaptureFactory

  • public class sTestScreenCaptureFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Demonstrates sTestScreenCaptureFactory().
    This class factory is used to take screen shots during a testNG test
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    davidwramer

    • Constructor Detail

      • sTestScreenCaptureFactory

        public sTestScreenCaptureFactory(java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        This method demonstrates sTestScreenCaptureFactory(). This class drives all oTest testNG tests. sTestWebDriveFactory encapsulates all other oTest factories. This method encapsulates all the oDesk. obo, mail_gui, and mobile page declarations.
        Parameters:
        resources - use the Bichromate.properties file to pass along to all factories

      • sTestScreenCaptureFactory

        public sTestScreenCaptureFactory()
        This method demonstrates sTestScreenCaptureFactory(). This class drives all oTest testNG tests.
        oTestWebDriveFactory encapsulates all other oTest factories.
        This class encapsulates all the oDesk. obo, mail_gui, and mobile page declarations.
